turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hello, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I need to order two medium extra cheese pizzas from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Actually, instead I want extra cheese on both but I also want one of them to be a Veggie Lovers and the other one can just be extra cheese.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what size pizzas did you say you wanted for those two?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Medium, both of them medium.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you said 2 medium pizzas, 1 veggie lovers and 1 with extra cheese?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Right. I want extra cheese on both but I won't want them to be Veggie Lovers and the other one just cheese but extra cheese. If that makes sense. I don't know. It's a little Yeah.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: oh, got it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 2 medium pizzas, 1 veggie lovers with extra cheese, and 1 with extra cheese.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: is that right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that's perfect.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: whatever floats your boat. the total for this order is $24.33.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Alright, thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: should i place the order now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, i've placed the order. it'll be ready in 25 mins for pick up.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Alright. That will do it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: do you need anything else?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: awesome, take care. enjoy your pizzas.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks.
